StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMediaInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT
[MediaInfoID], mi.[TypeID] As MediaTypeID, mt.Descrip.on AS MediaTypeName,
mi.Organiza.onID, mi.[Descripton] As MediaName, cp.[CollegePro.leID], poc.[PointOfContactID], cp.School_code AS SchoolCode, cp.FiscalYear, poc.[PointOfContactID], [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName],[POCFirstName], [Street1],[Street2],[City],[State],[ZipCode], [TelephoneNumber],[CellPhoneNumber], [FaxNumber],[EmailAddress],[ValueToOSS],[Remarks]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC]. MediaType mt
INNER JOIN [MediaInfo] mi ON mt.MediaTypeID = mi.TypeID
INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].PointOfContact poc ON mi.PointOfContactID = poc.PointOfContactID INNER JOIN [CollegePro.le] cp ON mi.[CollegePro.leID]= cp.[CollegePro.leID]
WHERE cp.School_Code = @SchoolCode AND cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
